class sra_wrapper.sra.SRA[source]

Bases: object

Main class for returning specific data from the API

BASE_URL = 'https://some-random-api.ml'
static check_error(response)[source]

Checks error while trying to request to the API :raises NoResponse: If the API responses with a error message. :raises requests.exceptions.HTTPError: If the API doesnt doesnt response.
